title: Burning Hands

Level 1 Evocation Spell

Each flammable target is hit with 3∼18 Fire damage.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

Burning hands is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Burning hands is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Burning Hands Information

Description: Each flammable target is hit with 3∼18 Fire damage. On Save: Targets still take half damage. School: Evocation Spells Casting Time: Action Range: 5m/17ft (cone) Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Dexterity

How to Acquire Burning Hands

Burning hands can be acquired by the following classes and races: Wizard, Sorcerer, Arcane Trickster, Draconic Ancestry: Red, Eldritch Knight, Light Domain, The Fiend Mephistopheles Tiefling Once per Long Rest Burning hands can be cast by using the following Items: Scroll of Burning Hands
